data.title: 145 Clever Names & Nicknames for Mom or Mother
data.meta_description: Give your mom a meaningful nickname to show just how special your relationship with her is.
data.text:
Sometimes mom or mother just doesn't cut it when it comes to calling your mom a one-of-a-kind or sweet nickname. We love the idea of having a nickname for your mum that's just for you — it helps you share a special bond. So if you're looking for the perfect nicknames for your mom, our list is a great place to start.

Finding Names for Mom

Not sure where to start to find the perfect nickname for your mom? When coming up with an alternate name for your mom, consider her personality, what she likes, and anything else unique about her. Once you've landed on a few nicknames that you love, check in with your mom to see which one is her favorite.

Nicknames for Mom

We love starting simple. After all, you can never go wrong with the classics.

Mom Mom

Mommers

Mommaroony

Mamas

Mummy

Ma

Mommykins

Maw

Mums

Teddy-bear

Funny Nicknames for Mom

We love a light, jokey nickname as a way to share your humorous bond. If your mom is a funny lady, try these nicknames.

Mama Llama

Mama-rama-ding-dong

Mooma

Moomy

Mom-a-tron

Mumsy

Mumster

Mumster Mash

The Firecracker

Momster

Sha-ma-la-ma-mom-mom

Mums the Word

Ouchie Fixer

Mamasaurus Rex

Safety Queen

Momma Supreme

The Ther-mom-meter

Mother Hen

Owl Eyes

Chamber of Secrets

Mom-a-woo-woo

The Vault

Mumster-cheese

Mombo Jombo

Mombelty Peg

Momma Pot Pie

Cute Nicknames for Moms

How cute are these nicknames for your mom? We adore how fun they are.

Meemee

Mima

Meems

Momsy

Sunshine

Sparkles

Mama Bear

Snuggles

Cuddles

Patience

Lovey

Snuggy

Kissie

Smooches

Smoochinator

Caffeine Queen

Dimples

Contact Names for Mom

You may want to put a sweet or funny nickname for your mom in your contacts. That way, you'll always smile when you see her calling or texting. Some contact name options for mom include:

My gal

Gal pal

Moma

My Everything

Momma

Mommy

My Mommy

Mamma Mia

Best Mom in the World

Partner in Crime

Mom Mom Mom Mom

MOMMYMOMMY

The Rule-maker

My Cheerleader

The Worrier

Angel Mommy

Bestie

Guardian Angel

The Fixer

Healer of All

My Hero

My Role Model

CallmebackCallmebackCallmeback

Make Good Choices

Alternative Names for Mom

These sweet alternative mom names show exactly who she is and how much she means to you.

Lullaby Queen

The Healer

The Protector

The Queen of Cuddles

The Momness

Angel Momma

Dynamom

Captain Fix It

Maman

What Name Can I Call My Mother?

The best names to call your mom are those that make you both smile. Try some of these fun names.

Sweets

Mama Honey

Captain Cookies

Giggles

Moosh

Halo

Angel

Sunshine

Mama Glow

Blaze

What's a Good Mom Name?

A good mom name is one that's sweet or funny and shows who she is to you.

Calm Mom

Mama Bird

Dr. Mommy

Bunbun

Mom-er-ific

Mom-O

Mother Goose

Matron Mama

The Matriarch

Madam Mommy

My Mommers

The Caretaker

Nova

Related: 61 Powerful Quotes About a Mother's Love

Super Mom Names

If your mom is the best (and of course she is!), you may want her nickname to reflect her superhero status. Some super mom nicknames include:

Super Mom

Super Mum

Super Mama-mia

Super Mummy

Mega Mom

Iron Mom

Captain Mom

Aquamom

Wonder Mom

Batmom

The Mominator (should always be spoken in Arnold Schwarzenegger's voice)

Nicknames for Mom in Spanish

Spanish just rolls off the tongue in beautiful ways. Try one of these Spanish nicknames for mom.

Mama

Mamacita

La Mejor (the best)

Ma

Mami

Amami

Madrecita

Mi Corazón (my heart)

Nicknames for Moms in Other Languages

There are so many ways to say mom in other languages. Try one of these.

Ema (Estonian)

Mami (German)

Haha (Japanese)

Matka (Belarusan, Czech)

Maji (Hindi)

Mataji (Punjabi)

Aiti (Finnish)

Maman (French)

Makuahini (Hawaiian)

Ibu (Malay)

Majko (Bosnian)

Mère (French)

Matinka (Ukrainian)

Mamamina (Italian)

Mamuska (Polish)

Ahm (Arabic)

Nanay (Filipino)

Find a Great Nickname for Your Mom

Make your bond with your mom even deeper by giving her a nickname that reflects her personality and your unique relationship. It's a sweet way to show her how much you love and appreciate her. Picking a perfect nickname for your mom can take some time, so be patient and narrow down your options to a few choices before picking the best one for her.
